# value

**Instance Property**

The category value for this sample.

## Declaration

```swift
var value: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

This value must come from the appropriate category value enumeration. Each category type uses its own enumeration. For more information, see Category Type Identifiers in [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/healthkit-constants].

## Getting Property Data

- **categoryType**: The category type for this sample.
